Class ScribeBlockingMessagePublisher

java.lang.Object
  com.inmobi.messaging.publisher.AbstractMessagePublisher

          com.inmobi.messaging.netty.ScribeBlockingMessagePublisher
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScribePublisherConfiguration, MessagePublisher
public class ScribeBlockingMessagePublisher
extends ScribeMessagePublisher

Blocks the thread publishing the message till the time queue gets space to add the message.
